Class LibraryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.library.service.LibraryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
LibraryService
public class LibraryServiceImpl extends Object implements LibraryService
Implementation of the library service. Provides core library operations including borrowing, returning, and searching.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LibraryServiceImpl(UserRepository userRepository, MediaItemRepository mediaItemRepository, LoanRepository loanRepository, FineRepository fineRepository, FineCalculator fineCalculator)
    Constructs a new library service with the specified repositories and fine calculator.

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryServiceImpl

      public LibraryServiceImpl(UserRepository userRepository, MediaItemRepository mediaItemRepository, LoanRepository loanRepository, FineRepository fineRepository, FineCalculator fineCalculator)
      Constructs a new library service with the specified repositories and fine calculator.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository for user data
      mediaItemRepository - the repository for media item data
      loanRepository - the repository for loan data
      fineRepository - the repository for fine data
      fineCalculator - the calculator for fine amounts using Strategy pattern

  • Method Details

    • addMediaItem

      public MediaItem addMediaItem(MediaItem item)
      Adds a new media item to the library collection.
      Specified by:
      addMediaItem in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      item - the media item to add
      Returns:
      the saved media item with generated ID

    • searchItems

      public List<MediaItem> searchItems(String keyword)
      Searches for media items by keyword. Delegates to the repository search method.
      Specified by:
      searchItems in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      keyword - the search keyword
      Returns:
      list of matching media items

    • borrowItem

      public Loan borrowItem(int userId, int itemId, LocalDate today)
      Processes a borrowing request for a user. Validates eligibility, creates loan, and updates available copies.
      Specified by:
      borrowItem in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user borrowing the item
      itemId - the ID of the media item to borrow
      today - the current date (used for loan and due date calculation)
      Returns:
      the created Loan object
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if user is not eligible or item is unavailable

    • returnItem

      public void returnItem(int loanId, LocalDate returnDate)
      Processes the return of a borrowed item. Updates loan status, increments available copies, and calculates fines if overdue. Uses Strategy pattern for fine calculation based on media type.
      Specified by:
      returnItem in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      loanId - the ID of the loan to return
      returnDate - the date the item is returned
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if loan not found or already returned

    • getOverdueLoans

      public List<Loan> getOverdueLoans(LocalDate today)
      Retrieves all overdue loans as of the specified date. Delegates to the repository.
      Specified by:
      getOverdueLoans in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      today - the current date to check against due dates
      Returns:
      list of overdue loans

    • getUserLoans

      public List<Loan> getUserLoans(int userId)
      Retrieves all loans for a specific user. Delegates to the repository.
      Specified by:
      getUserLoans in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of loans for the user

    • canUserBorrow

      public boolean canUserBorrow(int userId, LocalDate today)
      Checks if a user is eligible to borrow items. User must have no overdue loans and no unpaid fines.
      Specified by:
      canUserBorrow in interface LibraryService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to check
      today - the current date
      Returns:
      true if user can borrow, false otherwise
